text: Yakobo yayagala Laakeeri, era n’agamba Labbaani nti, “Nzija kukuweereza29:18 Anaawasa omugole ye yawangayo ebintu ebyogereza omuwala eri kitaawe w’omuwala (34:12). Kyokka bw’atabanga na kya kuwaayo, yapakasanga ewa kitaawe w’omuwala okumala ebbanga lye baalagaananga. emyaka musanvu olwa muwala wo omuto Laakeeri.”
